column3: 2015) send sympathy card grants pass - glenna a. mitchell
column5: passed away peacefully surrounded by loving family on wednesday
column7: 2015. she met and married eugene ""gene"" mitchell on december 25
column8: 1951. together they raised their family in the grants pass area. she was a woman of great faith who loved the lord and adored her family. she is survived by her husband
column14: and rayburn; and many several grandchildren. services took place on saturday
column17: at the silverton first baptist church. she was laid to rest with her parents at bethany pioneer cemetery of silverton. print back express your condolences contact us get mobile version privacy terms of use 2002 - 2015 unger funeral chapel funeral home website by batesville
